I was scared it wouldn't be big enough for my large textbooks, but it was! This backpack is much bigger than it looks and is easy to organize thanks to the number of compartments and space within them. There are at least 6 different compartments, and each is pretty large. I can fit four 1" binders, 3 VERY thick textbooks, a large pencil case, my phone, an mp3 player, guitar picks and tuner, a bag of makeup, 2 small books, and a sweater in this bag, so if you're concerned about size, don't be. Overall, it's incredibly sturdy, the magnets that hold the flap over the top are quite strong and the zippers are high quality. I'm very satisfied with this backpack. (:

I was shocked at the versatility and functionality of this backpack. It’s very well made and appears heavy duty. If fit my MacBook Pro, work files, a planner (back section), toiletries, change of clothes pre and post workout, shoes, snacks, charging bank, (middle pocket), pens, chargers, keys (front pocket), and there are several hidden pockets through the backpack that I haven’t needed to use yet. I was able to condense a work out bag, a heavy laptop bag and a lunch bag into this one backpack! I admit it’s large once packed but it’s better than carrying several bags and being bogged down and disorganized. Once on, it is comfortable with great weight distribution with the straps. Highly recommended for the price and quality.
